verses.verse: And when He opened the seal, the seventh one, there became a hush in the heaven as if it were half an hour.
And I saw the seven angels that had stood in the sight of God. And seven trumpets were given to them.

And another angel went and was stood on the altar having a gold incense burner. And much incense was given to him so that he might give it with the prayers of all the sacred people on the altar, the gold altar, the altar in the sight of the throne.
And the smoke of the incense tumbled up with the prayers of the sacred people from the angel's hand in the sight of God.
And the angel has taken the incense burner, filled it full of coals from the fire of the altar, and threw it to the earth. And there became sounds, thunders, lightnings, and an earthquake.
And the seven angels, the ones having the seven trumpets, got themselves ready so that they might blow the trumpets.

And the first angel blew a trumpet, and there became hail and fire that had been mixed with blood. And it was thrown to the earth, the third part of the trees were burned up, and all green vegetation was burned up.
And the second angel blew a trumpet, and what was as a huge mountain being burned with fire was thrown into the sea. And the third part of the sea became blood,
the third part of the created things (the ones in the sea, the ones having souls) died, and the third part of the boats were devoured.
And the third angel blew a trumpet, and a huge star fell from the sky being burned as a torch. And it fell on the third part of the rivers and on the springs of the waters.
And the name of the star is called Absinthium. And the third part of the waters became into absinthium, and many of the people died from the waters because they were bitter.

And the fourth angel blew a trumpet, and the third part of the sun, the third part of the moon, and the third part of the stars was impacted so that the third part of them would be made dark. And the day may not shine, the third part of it, and the night likewise.

And I looked and heard one angel flying in the middle of the sky, saying with a loud voice, "What a tragedy! What a tragedy! What a tragedy to the people residing on the earth from the rest of the sounds of the trumpet of the three angels, the angels that are going to be blowing."
